channel.title: Cellular Data on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Cellular Data on 0x000216

item.title: Wireless Internet Access For Farms
item.description: While living and working on a farm has its perks, getting reliable broadband internet can be a challenge. Conventional options like DSL and Cable might not be feasible due to distance limitations, often leaving farms outside their service areas. Don’t worry, there are other solutions for obtaining reasonably priced internet access in rural areas. These alternatives focus on services that overcome distance barriers or eliminate the need for physical cables.

item.title: iPhone Getting its Video in a Sling
item.description: The mobile video landscape is seeing growth in various forms, including carrier-specific services like Verizon’s VCAST and Sprint TV, and dedicated channels such as MediaFLO. Sling Media’s introduction of a SlingPlayer for iPhone has the potential to disrupt the market by giving control of content back to the user. Sling Media is known for its Slingbox, a device that connects to your television source (satellite receiver, DVR, or cable box) and a broadband connection.

item.title: T-Mobile 3G Aircard For PC and Mac
item.description: Want to connect your laptop to T-Mobile’s 3G network and get free access to their HotSpots? The T-Mobile webConnect USB Laptop Stick can make that happen. This device is a wireless modem with a USB connector that plugs into your PC or Mac. PCs require Windows XP or Vista, while Macs need OS X 10.3.9 or higher. This aircard provides internet access virtually anywhere in the U.S. with T-Mobile cellular coverage.
